Tongmenghui, Sun Yat-sen's alliance for democracy, founded 1905, became the Guomindang 國民黨|国民党 in 1912

sentences.english: In 1906 he met Mr. Sun Yat-sen in Japan and joined the Chinese Revolutionary League.
sentences.chinese: 1906年他在日本得會孫中山，並加入同盟會。

sentences.english: The Bashu United League is an organization of people from Sichuan Province in China and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 巴蜀同盟會是由海內外四川人組成的組織。

sentences.english: If this is the case, where did the Ba-Shu United League obtain its numbers?
sentences.chinese: 這是實情，那麼巴蜀同盟會的數據又是如何得出的呢？

sentences.english: Once more, her allies will give rise to the thought of life anew.
sentences.chinese: 再一次，她的同盟會重新給於生命的想法。

sentences.english: Passion is the true nature of God, so does our Second Fight Alliance.
sentences.chinese: 激情，是上帝的本色，也是咱二戰同盟會的宗旨。
